name: Raiding Tool: Repair Kit
text: If this card is equipped to a "Tomb Raider" monster: you can destroy this card; equip 1 "Raiding Tool" from your GY to a face-up "Tomb Raider" monster you control. During the End Phase of the turn this card was sent to the GY: you can add 1 "Raiding Tool" or "Tomb Raider" monster from your Deck to your Hand.
